avalancheActivity.comment: The avalanche risk is low. Persistent weak layers can be problematic. There are individual avalanche prone locations on extremely steep slopes in northern aspects above 2200 metres. Small slab avalanches can occasionally be triggered there with large additional loads.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The avalanche danger is mainly concentrated in the shady terrain at high altitudes.

snowpackStructure.comment: The snow surface has crusted can form in many places. It softens again during the daytime changes. On the shady slopes, it usually remains hard and icy. In shady slopes at higher elevations, weak layers can be found in the snow cover, snowpack. Otherwise, the snow cover, snowpack is compact and stable. There is little snow, on the south side the ground is covered up to high altitudes.

ALBINA.generalHeadline: Faceted crystals: kinetic metamorphism on the shady slopes
